section.name: Single Sign On (SSO)
section.p: Jetspeed 2 provides a Single-Sign-On component for storing credentials for a protected site which can be an URL or application. Please visit the Jetspeed-2 Single Sign On sub project documentation.

The SSO feature includes three main components:
The SSO Provider service which handles the backend operations SSO Provider
The SSO Management Portlet SSO Admin Portlet
The SSO Proxy Portlet SSO Proxy Portlet
